cloud_service_by_crn.name: cloud_service_by_crn
cloud_service_by_crn.description: List of cloud service CRNs. Each CRN will have a unique endpoint gateways created. For a list of supported services, see the docs [here](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/vpc?topic=vpc-vpe-supported-services).

cloud_services.name: cloud_services
cloud_services.description: List of cloud services to create an endpoint gateway.

prefix.name: prefix
prefix.description: The prefix that you would like to append to your resources

region.name: region
region.description: The region where VPC and services are deployed

resource_group_id.name: resource_group_id
resource_group_id.description: ID of the resource group where endpoint gateways will be provisioned

security_group_ids.name: security_group_ids
security_group_ids.description: List of security group ids to attach to each endpoint gateway.

service_endpoints.name: service_endpoints
service_endpoints.description: Service endpoints to use to create endpoint gateways. Can be `public`, or `private`.

subnet_zone_list.name: subnet_zone_list
subnet_zone_list.description: List of subnets in the VPC where gateways and reserved IPs will be provisioned. This value is intended to use the `subnet_zone_list` output from the Landing Zone VPC Subnet Module (https://github.com/terraform-ibm-modules/terraform-ibm-landing-zone-vpc) or from templates using that module for subnet creation.

vpc_id.name: vpc_id
vpc_id.description: ID of the VPC where the Endpoint Gateways will be created

vpc_name.name: vpc_name
vpc_name.description: Name of the VPC where the Endpoint Gateways will be created. This value is used to dynamically generate VPE names.
